sense.name: move the body backwards and down into a comfortable resting position
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent[animate]] RECLINE (NP2[patient|theme]) (PP[location]) NP1[patient|theme] RECLINE (PP[location])
sense.examples: She reclined her head on the pillow. There were plenty of soft cushions and carved benches to recline upon. As I recline, my head says more or less vertical. If only I could keep the person in front of me from reclining back into my spleen. The seat reclines to a full 160 degrees to provide the most comfortable sitting position possible.
